com.dooapp.gaedo.finders
Interface SortingBuilder<InformerType extends Informer<?>>

public interface SortingBuilder<InformerType extends Informer<?>>

A sorting builder allow the creation of a sorting expression from an informer

Author:
ndx

Method Summary
 SortingExpression createSortingExpression(InformerType informer)
          Creates a sorting expression from an informer. usually, this methods involves a call to SortingExpressionImpl constructor followed by calls to SortingExpression.add(FieldInformer, com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.SortingExpression.Direction)
 

Method Detail

createSortingExpression

SortingExpression createSortingExpression(InformerType informer)
Creates a sorting expression from an informer. usually, this methods involves a call to SortingExpressionImpl constructor followed by calls to SortingExpression.add(FieldInformer, com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.SortingExpression.Direction)

Parameters:
informer - source class informer
Returns:
a sorting expression allowing sorting of data
